name: LeMonk And The Return Of The Funny!
name_original: LeMonk And The Return Of The Funny!
description:
This is a small fodian like game where you (LeMonk) need to get to the top. You do this to  get the hot sexy princess of course.

Expected playtime (First playthrough): 2-3 hours.

Credits:

Art:
Most assets I got from the LowPoly Simple Nature Pack.
Assets not from this pack I made myself.

Programming:
All code was made by me.

Sounds:
All music and sounds are from freesound.org.
